desc: Sharp, pointed metal bit fashioned after a claw. Used by assassins as concealed caltrops.

dictionary.lore:
A sharp, pointed bit of lightweight metal fashioned after a crow's claw. Capable of filling a variety of functions, but most notably as concealed caltrops by savvy—and sassy—assassins. The crow, after all, is one of their most popular symbols.

Besides its more practical uses, Vrána prefers to hollow them at the base and fit them over her fingers. Useless in manipulating her enormous crossbow, but oh so fashionable.

name: Crowsgrip
